articles.title: Rhiannon Giddens on You're the One, Omar, Pulitzer Win - Vulture
articles.description: The folk musician Rhiannon Giddens is releasing her first album of all original songs, “You’re the One.” In an interview, she speaks about songwriting, going solo from the Carolina Chocolate Drops, and winning the Pulitzer Prize for her opera “Omar.”
